snippet.desc: This Behavior is responsible for keeping track of the current animation and overriding that animation (if appropriate) when a new animation request is made.
snippet.description: This Behavior is responsible for keeping track of the current animation and overriding that animation (if appropriate) when a new animation request is made.
snippet.name: Animation Manager

list.desc:
Enter in a list of animation categories.
Animations that are higher up will override
the ones below it.
list.name: _CategoryHierarchy

snippet.desc: Allows the actor to move up, down, left and right as well as in diagonal directions.
snippet.description: Allows the actor to move up, down, left and right as well as in diagonal directions.
snippet.name: Ghost Movement

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurningWhileMoving

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will move in diagonal directions at the same speed as in axis-aligned directions.
If unselected, the actor will move in diagonal direction at a speed that is the sum of the axis-aligned velocities.
boolean.name: _NormalizeDiagonalSpeed

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events.
Trigger the events MoveUp, MoveDown, MoveLeft or MoveRight to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

boolean.desc: If selected and moving in a diagonal direction, the Up and Down animations will be used, otherwise the Left and Right animations will be used.
boolean.name: _PreferVerticalAnimtations

snippet.desc: Makes the camera follow this Actor.
snippet.description: Makes the camera follow this Actor.
snippet.name: Camera Follow Player

number.desc: Horizontal Offset from the Actor
number.name: _XOffset

number.desc: Vertical Offset from the Actor
number.name: _YOffset

snippet.desc: Makes the actor move back and forth vertically.
snippet.description: Makes the actor move back and forth vertically.
snippet.name: Back and Forth Vertically

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving up.
number.name: _DistanceUp

number.desc: The movement speed.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc: The direction in which the actor will be moving when created.
number.name: _InitialDirection

number.desc: The distance the actor will be moving down.
number.name: _DistanceDown

boolean.desc:
If selected, the actor will change the movement direction when colliding.
If unselected, the actor will try to keep on moving in the current direction.
boolean.name: _ChangeDirectiononCollision

number.desc: Amortissement de la chute lors de la descente
number.name: _AmortissementDescente

number.desc: Amplitude du balancement dans la descente
number.name: _AmplitudeDescente

number.desc: Periode de balancement lors de la descente
number.name: _BalancementDescente

animation.desc: Animation quand il meurt et qu'il descend sous la terre
animation.name: _ghost

number.desc: Amortissement de la chute lors de la descente sous la terre
number.name: _AmortissementDescente

number.desc: Periode de balancement lors de la descente sous terre
number.name: _BalancementDescente

number.desc: Amplitude du balancement dans la descente sous la terre
number.name: _AmplitudeDescente

snippet.desc: If the Actor falls off the bottom of the screen, the scene will be reloaded.
snippet.description: If the Actor falls off the bottom of the screen, the scene will be reloaded.
snippet.name: Die in Pit

number.desc: Set the amount of time the screen will fade after falling in. In and Out will be the same.
number.name: _FadeTime

number.desc:
Set this to how long you wish to wait before reloading the scene.
Useful for displaying a Spawned Actor on Death animation so it completes before the reload.
number.name: _TimeBeforeReload

event.displayName: Copy of Copy of Actor Created
event.name: event-type-create-kill

snippet.desc: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Prevent the actor from leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Cannot Exit Screen

snippet.desc: Make the actor rotate around a given point.
snippet.description: Make the actor rotate around a given point.
snippet.name: Rotate Around Point

number.desc: The x-coordinate of the center of rotation.
number.name: _CenterX

number.desc: The y-coordinate of the center of rotation.
number.name: _CenterY

number.desc:
The speed of the rotation around the center.
If positive, the rotation is clockwise.
If negative, the rotation is counter-clockwise.
number.name: _Speed

number.desc:
Only used if Point Away is selected.
The facing of the actor's sprite.
number.name: _Facing

boolean.desc:
If selected, point the actor away from the center.
If unselected, don't change the facing of the actor while rotating.
boolean.name: _PointAway

number.desc:
If the distance between the actor and the center changes be more than this, the radius of the rotation will be adjusted.
Can be changed for fine tuning, should not be too small.
number.name: _DistanceThreshold

boolean.desc: If selected the radius will not be adjusted dynamically.
boolean.name: _FixedRadius

boolean.desc:
If selected, the control attributes will be used to control the movement.
If unselected, the control attributes are ignored and the movement can be controlled by triggering custom events. Trigger the events MoveLeft or MoveRight to make the actor move as if the keys were pressed.
boolean.name: _UseControls

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to move vertically.
boolean.name: _PreventVerticalMovement

number.desc: The speed of the movement.
number.name: _Speed

boolean.desc: If selected, the actor will not be able to turn while moving.
boolean.name: _StopTurning

boolean.desc: If selected, the animation attributes will be used, otherwise they will be ignored.
boolean.name: _UseAnimations

number.desc: décalage x de l'objet dans les mains
number.name: _offsetx

number.desc: décalage y de l'objet dans les mains
number.name: _offsety

number.desc: The distance between the peak and the initial axis.
number.name: _AmplitudeY

number.desc: The distance between the peak and the initial axis.
number.name: _Amplitude

snippet.desc: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.description: Allow the player to simulate even when going off screen. This prevents the player from freezing when leaving the screen.
snippet.name: Always Simulate
